titleStmt.title: [A brief censure upon] an appeale to Cæsar
Appello Cæsarem. English
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from headline. Pages 17-40 only.
Place of publication from STC; publication date conjectured by STC.
All copies imperfect. Queen's Colledge (University of Oxford. Library.) copy contains B-F4.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Imperfect; quires D³, E-F⁴ only (a leaf signed E1 inserted between quires D and E).
